# textEncodingName

**Type Property**

The name of the text encoding to use.

## Declaration

```swift
static let textEncodingName: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object containing the name, IANA or otherwise, of a text encoding to be used. This attribute is mutually exclusive with [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/DocumentAttributeKey/characterEncoding].

## Getting document type keys

- **documentType**: The document type.
- **fileType**: The document type for interpreting the document.

items.description: The document type for interpreting the document.
